title: War Nations.io
description: War Nations.io is a real-time multiplayer game. Compete with other players to conquer the map, using simple drag-and-drop controls to lead your troops into battle. Send more attackers than your opponent's defenders to claim victory and be the last nation standing. With 2-4 players in each room and endless rooms to join, customize your nickname and avatar, and show your strategic prowess in this thrilling war game.
